mapper.select: SELECT sa.id,sa.sale_attr_id,sa.sale_attr_name,sa.spu_id,sv.id sale_attr_value_id,sv.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.sale_attr_id=sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id=sv.spu_id WHERE sa.spu_id=#{0}

SELECT sa.id,sa.spu_id,sa.sale_attr_id,sa.sale_attr_name,sv.id sale_attr_value_id,sv.sale_attr_value_name,ssav.sku_id,if(sku_id is NULL,0,1) as ischecked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.sale_attr_id=sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id=sv.spu_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON sv.id=ssav.sale_attr_value_id AND sv.sale_attr_id=ssav.sale_attr_id AND sku_id=#{arg0} WHERE sa.spu_id=#{arg1} ORDER BY sv.sale_attr_id,sv.id
